name: Vitamin D and K Status Influences Bone Mineral Density and Bone Accrual in Children and Adolescents with Celiac Disease
description: The study objective was to determine the interrelationships between vitamin K/D status and lifestyle variables on bone mineral density) in children and adolescents with celiac disease at diagnosis and after 1 year on the gluten-free diet.

citation.text: Mager, DR, Qiao J, Turner J. Vitamin D and K status influences bone mineral density and bone accrual in children and adolescents with celiac disease. European Journal of Clinical Nutrition (2012) 66, 488-495.

funder.name: Canadian Celiac Association; University of Alberta
